comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Wonderful shot, with the exception of the Super and Chief the average age is probably about 24.  They look like a very fit and active group of men but the conditions in those days were very tough and you might find that not many of them lasted the pace!

comment.author: 77603809@N02
comment._content: The two symmetrically arranged chaps in mufti look a bit like detectives from Central Casting...
